title: Beyond mere appendicitis: A case report on an unforeseen diagnosis of appendiceal schwannoma
details: W Markey, J Blundell, C Law, R Warner - Surgery Case Reports, 2024
abstract: ABSTRACT INTRODUCTION Appendiceal schwannomas are a rare diagnosis, with little evidence to guide management and follow-up. There are currently no case reports focusing on follow-up for appendiceal schwannomas after complete surgical …
